activity: Start project review work on research proposal
Complete outlining activites and finalize proposal
Acquire germplasm material, input fertilizers, plant protection chemicals and accessory materials required for planting
Seed sowing, verification and application of necessary inputs
First interculture operation and irrigation. Note taking on germination and plant stand. Field surveillance for inspection of pest occurance. Application of plant protection chemicals.
Observation and data recording on male and female flowering. Application of plant protection chemicals. Second irrigation.
Observation and data recording on plant architecture (height, ear height, lodging). Application of plant protection chemicals (if necessary)
Completion of post harvest processing operations (Drying, dehusking, cleaning, shelling). Record taking on attributes related to harvested ear.
Completion of data preprocessing and entry into analysis ready format
Completion of data analysis, inference and result interpretation
Manuscript write up and finalizing article for supervior review
Finalizing article and submitting for publication
Completion of article and manuscript writeup with possible revision
